commands: kick - Kick a user from this server. - kick <user>
ban - Ban a user from this server. - ban <user>
timeban - Ban a user for a certain amount of time (This command also attempts to DM the user when they're unbanned). - timeban <user> <time>
echo - Send a message to a specific channel. - echo <channel id> <msg...>
clippy - Generates a standard clippy image - clippy <msg...>
clippyoption - Generates a clippy image with options [Yes] or [No]. - clippyoption <msg...>
clippyok - Generates a clippy image with an `OK` button. - clippyoption <msg...>
color - Generate a random color. Run this multiple times to generate a color palette - color
latex - Generate an equation png via latex. - latex <equation...>
genlatex - Get a formatted equation string to insert into the latex command. - genlatex <expr...>
pick - Pick between options (seperated by `or`). - pick <opt 1> or <opt 2> or <opt 3> or ...
settz - Set (or update) a timezone for others to reference. - settz <timezone...>
time - Get someones current time (If they have a timezone set). - time <user...>
removetz - Remove your timezone if one is currently set. - removetz
remind - Create a reminder. - remind <time> <reminder msg...>
wikipedia - Get a wikipedia article based on your search entry. - wikipedia <search entry...>
connect - Connect R. Sainis music player to a voice chat. - connect
disconnect - Disconnect R. Sainis music player from a voice chat. - disconnect
play - Add a song to the queue. (Youtube) - play <song>
pause - Pause the RoboPlayer. - pause
resume - Resume the RoboPlayer. - resume
stop - Stop the music player. (Refreshes the queue) - stop
queue - Get the list of songs in the queue, as well as songs that are currently playing. - queue
skip - Skip a song. - skip
setsb - Mark a channel as a starboard channel. - setsb <channel id>
getsb - Get the servers current starboard. - getsb
unlocksb - Unlock the starboard. - unlocksb
locksb - Lock the starboard. - locksb
setthreshold - Set the amount of stars for a message to be displayed to the starboard. - setthreshold <number>
getthreshold - Get the amount of stars a message needs for it to be displayed onto the starboard. - getthreshold
imagine - Generate an image! - imagine <prompt...>
charlihearts - The the amount of charli hearts in the server. - charlihearts
